attributes.action: use his influence to prevent Luton Town Football Club from signing players yet more players from rival teams.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The disgraceful actions of the Luton Town this season in signing not just one, but two players from Watford FC threaten to undermine decades of proud sporting tradition in Bedfordshire.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
